Original:
進到G9庫後映入眼簾的是一間玻璃隔間裡各式各樣的葡萄酒，斜對面一櫃洋酒排到廚房門口，我的人生目前還沒有這樣的熱衷🤣但卻很敬佩老闆這樣的執著與專業。

平常只是喝喝啤酒的我們，到基酒庫就把所有的小食點了一圈，由老闆介紹搭配的餐前及餐後葡萄酒味道也不會過於濃厚，這是很輕鬆又不失優雅的環境，我一直想在之後有天能夠不帶小孩的跟朋友到這裡聊天～小酌葡萄酒，然後感受一下片刻的安靜與放縱。
EN:
After entering the G9 library, it is a variety of wines in a glass compartment. A piece of wine on the opposite side of the cabinet is ranked at the door of the kitchen. My life is not so enthusiastic about it but admired the boss. Perseverance and professionalism.

We usually just drink beer, and we will order all the snacks in the base wine store. The taste of the wine before and after the meal introduced by the boss will not be too strong. This is a very easy and elegant environment. , I always wanted to chat with friends without a child in the future ~ drink wine, and then feel the quietness and indulgence of a moment.
